headline: Where is Schlumberger Limited (SLB) Headed According to Analysts?
summary: Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of the best affordable growth stocks to buy. On August 20, UBS analyst Josh Silverstein lowered the firm’s price target on Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) to $44 from $45, keeping a Buy rating on the shares. The analyst told investors in a research note that persistent commodity headwinds are continually dampening […]
